quote: Concentration and mental toughness are the margins of victory.
Concentration comes out of a combination of confidence and hunger.
Concentration is my motto - first honesty, then industry, then concentration.
Concentration, Confidence, Competitive urge, Capacity for enjoyment.
In deep meditation the flow of concentration is continuous like the flow of oil.
It is certain that concentration camps had a bad reputation with us.
Ninety percent of my game is mental. It's my concentration that has gotten me this far.
Concentration and mental toughness are the margins of victory.
Concentration comes out of a combination of confidence and hunger.
Concentration is my motto - first honesty, then industry, then concentration.
Concentration, Confidence, Competitive urge, Capacity for enjoyment.
In deep meditation the flow of concentration is continuous like the flow of oil.
It is certain that concentration camps had a bad reputation with us.
Ninety percent of my game is mental. It's my concentration that has gotten me this far.
The formula for success is simple: practice and concentration then more practice and more concentration.
The magic of the pen lies in the concentration of your thoughts upon one object.
The only prudence in life is concentration.
No doubt concentration camps were a means, a menace used to keep order.
No fine work can be done without concentration and self-sacrifice and toil and doubt.
